basic_data.name: DMU 210 P
basic_data.additional_name: Material for machining: Steel, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Cast Iron, Non-ferrous Metals, Plastic
basic_data.description: The DMU 210 P (FD) is an advanced multifunctional machine tool primarily used for precision milling and machining of metal parts. This high-end model ensures precision and efficiency in manufacturing processes.

main_characteristics.title: Integrated Machining: Milling, Turning, and Grinding in One Setup
content: Our new technology enables complete machining in a single setup, combining milling and turning with integrated grinding technology. The DirectDrive table with a torque of up to 6800 Nm ensures not only efficiency but also the highest surface quality of the workpieces.

main_characteristics.title: Integrated Solutions for Maximum Accuracy
content: Our new machine tool provides maximum accuracy in machining thanks to its outstanding features. A water-cooled feed drive and a belt filter system with a standard capacity of 980 liters ensure not only excellent precision but also optimal working conditions. Additionally, the machine is equipped with cooled linear guides and an active spindle expansion control system, guaranteeing long-term machining accuracy.

main_characteristics.title: Performance, Dynamics, and Innovative Solutions
content: The machine tool delivers unparalleled efficiency with high dynamics, achieving feed speeds of up to 60,000 mm/min and cutting feed forces of up to 40 kN. Available in both milling and turning versions, it offers the largest spindle selection on the market, including the powerMASTER motor spindle with a torque of up to 1000 Nm and the torqueMASTER gear spindle with a power of 1800 Nm. Additionally, it ensures energy efficiency through intelligent power modules and an innovative circular magazine with up to 303 tools while maintaining a minimal setup footprint. The gantry design with a vertically movable crossbeam and hydraulic weight compensation ensures stability and precision during operation.

main_characteristics.title: Machine Tool Built on an Innovative Thermosymmetric Structure
content: Our machine offers maximum rigidity and dynamics, reaching acceleration of up to 6 m/s². Thanks to its thermosymmetric structure and three-point support with a rigid machine bed, no foundation is required, providing both time and cost savings in installation. We guarantee high thermal stability with positioning accuracy up to 10 μm as standard. Optionally, we offer a precision package that enables even higher accuracy—up to 8 μm. Furthermore, our unique high-precision variant offers unmatched positioning accuracy of up to 4 μm, making our machine tool globally exceptional.

specification.name: Highest Long-Term Accuracy
param: Cooled linear guides and active spindle expansion control

specification.name: Circular Magazine
param: With up to 303 tools while maintaining a minimal setup footprint
